login_fail: The email and password that you've entered is incorrect
regiser_fail: Information that you've entered is incorrect
warning_verify_register: Your email address hasn't been verified. Please click the verification link in the email that was sent to the address you signed up with. (Don't forget to check your spam folder.)
not_receive_mail: if you are unable to locate your activation email.
start_day: Start date must be greater than current date
end_day: End date must be greater than start date or current date
comfirm-join-campaign: Do you want to join to this campaign?
comfirm-leave-campaign: Do you want to leave to this campaign?
join_campaign_success: You joined to campaign is successfully!
join_campaign_fail: You join to campaign is fail!
not_found_campaign: There is no campaign to show.
comfirm_delete_expense: Are you sure delete this expense
comfirm-accept-request: Do you want to accept this member join to campaign?
comfirm-cancel-request: Do you want to reject this member join to campaign?
comfirm-block-member: Do you want to block this member in this campaign?
comfirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this?
delete_photo: Are you sure you want to cancel this photo?
confirm_close_event: Are you sure you want to close this event?
comfirm_open_event: Are you sure you want to open this event?
comfirm-close-campaign: Do you want to close this campaign?
close_campaign_success: You closed this campaign is successfully!
comfirm_open_campaign: Are you sure you want to open this campaign?
comfirm-invite-member: Do you want invite this user?
not_found_photo: There is no picture to show.
no_member_show: There is no member to show.
message-join-campaign: You must join to campaign to like this.
comfirm-accept-campaign: Would you like to accept this invitation?
no_event_show: There is no event to show.
model_closed: This activity is closed, you cannot take this action.
